text: Note that squared lines marking the top member of the toe are needed as well as the upper extent of the taper, and in this case it is necessary to mark in the line of the taper with pencil and straight-edge as at (B), Fig. 3. A saw cut is made at the upper toe line exactly down to the taper line, no farther.
handwritten_text: Note that squared lines marking the top member of the toe are needed as well as the upper extent of the taper, and in this case it is necessary to mark in the line of the taper with pencil and straight-edge as at (B), Fig. 3. A saw cut is made at the upper toe line exactly down to the taper line, no farther.
